players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
Diana: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Bob instead of Alice? That seems odd since Alice was killed."
Diana: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why reveal your result so early? This puts a target on your back. Bob, why are you silent?"
Charlie: "Diana, I investigated Bob because I suspected him, and my hunch was right. I revealed early to prevent another night kill. Bob's silence is damning. We must vote Bob out now."
